item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 06 Feb 2024
item.description:
1. OCaml meetups at different places
  2. Tutorials on Modules, Functors and Libraries
  3. opam 101: the first steps, by OCamlPro
  4. Bogue tutorials 0.1.0
  5. Announcing validate 1.0.0 - Enhanced Data Validation in OCaml!
  6. MirageOS hack retreat 2024 edition (April 22nd - 28th)
  7. Fmlib 0.5.8 with unicode parsers
  8. Learn Lambda Calculus in 10 minutes with OCaml
  9. ppx_minidebug 1.0.0: explore logs of type-annotated let-bindings, code branches
  10. OCaml Retreat at Auroville, India (March 10th - March 15th)
  11. OUPS meetup february 2024
  12. Other OCaml News
